TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content: Well it's got no monoprop storage either
Stock Fairings Go very badly with Tantares. Which ones do you recommend? Especially for Vostok.

Stock Fairings Go very badly with Tantares. Which ones do you recommend? Especially for Vostok.

Somewhere there's a procedural fairings add-on that lets you retexture them with Tantares-based textures. Look on the OP of this thread for it, maybe?

Beale, I think you need to update the module manager config for remote tech compatibility, some of the MIR parts with probe cores (parts E and F I believe) currently do not require remote tech connections to operate.

If only there was a stockalike Dragon already out there, hmm? It's very fun to use.

Hmmm, nice idea

Nice stuff!

Since some of you guys were mentioning Fregat earlier I thought I'd share one I make out of Tantares and Stock Parts:

http://i.imgur.com/RbuqluX.png

http://i.imgur.com/5j7Eqfx.png

http://i.imgur.com/DFleDhu.png

Very nice! More news on Fregat soon, I think I have figured out the layout of it... Only recently.

Small bug with the expanded cygnus/phoenix. By default it has no storage for LFO so its basically useless for a cargo ship in the stock game.

Looks good though ^^

Fixed!

Stock Fairings Go very badly with Tantares. Which ones do you recommend? Especially for Vostok.

Procedural fairings are probably the GoTo choice.

HGR fairings are also nice to use, I think there is an aerodynamics fix for those type of part fairings out there somewhere.

Beale, I think you need to update the module manager config for remote tech compatibility, some of the MIR parts with probe cores (parts E and F I believe) currently do not require remote tech connections to operate.

I'll fix that, many thanks!

Progress flag decals.

Available on all orbital modules.

"Hamal" directly converted into Cyrilic, perhaps it is a grievous insult, perhaps it is nonsense?

OTRAG

Just kidding. It's the WAC Corporal, check the Taerobee thread for more.

TUS

Stand for "TUS Upper Stage", recursive acronyms are a lot of fun.

Still is too far from being complete, but I have a few thoughts -

There will be two variants, basic and Fobos-Grunt alike drop-tank version. It's slightly complex... but I will see how this progresses.

The main issue with Fregat is: the nozzle is buried within the centre of the tanks, so cannot really be two separate parts.

Edited October 4, 2015 by Beale

Pretty cool!

If only there was a stockalike Dragon already out there, hmm? It's very fun to use.

Bah, that's the Dragon V2 (aka the stupid Dragon). I don't like the Dragon V2, it just looks a little too futuristic for me. Dragon V1 is a nice, normal spacecraft. Whenever I bug you about making Dragon, I always mean the Dragon V1, because so far, I haven't seen any stockalike versions.

By the way... How about making the Dragon V1?

Please don't put me on the ignore list like HuntsmanThe8/LordLemonFaceOfLemonistan/SuccinctLemon...

Just a heads-up. Porkjet is finally showing off his update/revamp of his inflatable modules, now called LivingSpace.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

A few things to take away from his images: He now has a cloth texture that he considers stockalike. It seems to be very close to RoverDude's cloth texture. Not crazy about it frankly. It's too off-white and dirty. I much prefer the ATV's clean white cloth texture.

He has defined stockalike hatch/node end textures. I think the design is nice, but it'd be better in a lighter, whiter color scheme. Anything beats this node end texture from stock.

Edited October 5, 2015 by curtquarquesso

Nothing on the forums, yet. But here's the reddit thread.

Hello Beale,

I'm just in preparation for a replica of the ROCKOT including BRIZ-K / KS / KM. Do you already have something planned or can i take the rocket?

PS: Would be nice if you clear up your mailbox.

greetings

hraban

Love the Pack! Thx!

Unfortunately, the Docking-Ports T053A and T053B (Soyuz-thingys) don't save/load for some reason.

When I try to lunch a Vessel from VAB or SPH or try loading one those Docking-Ports are just gone. Didn't try other Docking-Ports, but other parts from your pack work fantastically.
I have a problem with Tantares and RO. Most of my craft files are broken and the ones that aren't broken are broken when you open it. How do I fix this?

Just a heads-up. Porkjet is finally showing off his update/revamp of his inflatable modules, now called LivingSpace.

http://imgur.com/a/fZpyU

A few things to take away from his images: He now has a cloth texture that he considers stockalike. It seems to be very close to RoverDude's cloth texture. Not crazy about it frankly. It's too off-white and dirty. I much prefer the ATV's clean white cloth texture.

He has defined stockalike hatch/node end textures. I think the design is nice, but it'd be better in a lighter, whiter color scheme. Anything beats this node end texture from stock.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/thumb/6/6c/Radial_attachment_point.png/190px-Radial_attachment_point.png

All I really want now is capsule that fits that small inflatable to have a Soyuz clone with stockalike cloth/thermal blanket.

I have a problem with Tantares and RO. Most of my craft files are broken and the ones that aren't broken are broken when you open it. How do I fix this?

Recent updates, which changed a lot of R-7 parts, and deleted a few.

Decals: Sweet! How many more parts do you think you could get decals on before the next release?

Fregat: What are the main differences between Fregat, and the Phobos Fregat? Are they going to be running MonoProp, and will they have command/control modules?

Decals: Not sure, I know for sure the Cygnus and Soyuz capsule, but not much else yet.

Fregat: There is only a small difference, the Fobos-Grunt Fregat carries an expendable drop tank. They will be self-controllable, but run on LFO/OX (Real Fregat is typical UDMH/NTO fuel design).

Also I am very busy for much things, but have been working on something small and cool.

It is Indian and orange...

Just a heads-up. Porkjet is finally showing off his update/revamp of his inflatable modules, now called LivingSpace.

http://imgur.com/a/fZpyU

A few things to take away from his images: He now has a cloth texture that he considers stockalike. It seems to be very close to RoverDude's cloth texture. Not crazy about it frankly. It's too off-white and dirty. I much prefer the ATV's clean white cloth texture.

He has defined stockalike hatch/node end textures. I think the design is nice, but it'd be better in a lighter, whiter color scheme. Anything beats this node end texture from stock.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/thumb/6/6c/Radial_attachment_point.png/190px-Radial_attachment_point.png

If this is the new stock style I will not have to change much

I like it, as you say the white is a little dirty, but otherwise very clean and simple.

Sensible port end textures are a godsend!
